wikitext.*:
'''Chris Smith''' ([[1964]]) is the [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] editor of [[HarperCollins]], since [[1999]]. He edited several books about [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|Peter Jackson's films]] by [[Gary Russell]] and [[Jude Fisher]], but is most famous for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: Weapons and Warfare]]'', a book containing a lot of information about the weaponry used in [[Peter Jackson]]'s films.
